Class SierpinskiTriangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • SierpinskiTriangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SierpinskiTriangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a Sierpinski triangle, able to draw itself using a provided Graphics object.
    Version:
    2016-11-11
    Author:
    Nicholas, modified by Cameron
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double angleOffset
      The initial, absolute offset of the angle this triangle is drawn at.
      private static java.awt.Color BACKGROUND_COLOR
      The background color this triangle is drawn atop of.
      private int baseRadius
      The radius of this triangle.
      private java.awt.Point center
      The center point of the triangle.
      private int displacementRate
      The rate at which this triangle descends on-screen.
      private boolean drawCircle
      Whether or not inscribed circles should be drawn on this triangle.
      private int drawingDepth
      The recursion depth at which triangles are drawn.
      private boolean filled
      Whether or not this triangle should be drawn filled in.
      private java.awt.Color primaryColor
      The primary color of the triangle.
      private java.awt.Color primaryColorStep
      The change in the primary color required at each level of recursion to generate a gradient-like effect in the image.
      private double rotationalVelocity
      The rate at which this triangle rotates.
      private java.awt.Color secondaryColor
      The secondary color of the triangle.
      private java.awt.Color secondaryColorStep
      The change in the secondary color required at each level of recursion to generate a gradient-like effect in the image.
      private static long serialVersionUID
      Class serialization version to validate compatible serialization/de-serialization.

        Constant Field Values

      • drawingDepth

        private int drawingDepth
        The recursion depth at which triangles are drawn.

      • displacementRate

        private int displacementRate
        The rate at which this triangle descends on-screen.

      • baseRadius

        private int baseRadius
        The radius of this triangle.

      • angleOffset

        private double angleOffset
        The initial, absolute offset of the angle this triangle is drawn at.

      • rotationalVelocity

        private double rotationalVelocity
        The rate at which this triangle rotates.

      • drawCircle

        private boolean drawCircle
        Whether or not inscribed circles should be drawn on this triangle.

      • filled

        private boolean filled
        Whether or not this triangle should be drawn filled in.

      • center

        private java.awt.Point center
        The center point of the triangle.

      • primaryColorStep

        private java.awt.Color primaryColorStep
        The change in the primary color required at each level of recursion to generate a gradient-like effect in the image.

      • secondaryColorStep

        private java.awt.Color secondaryColorStep
        The change in the secondary color required at each level of recursion to generate a gradient-like effect in the image.

      • BACKGROUND_COLOR

        private static final java.awt.Color BACKGROUND_COLOR
        The background color this triangle is drawn atop of.

      • primaryColor

        private java.awt.Color primaryColor
        The primary color of the triangle. This color is used to draw the triangles.

      • secondaryColor

        private java.awt.Color secondaryColor
        The secondary color of the triangle. This color is used to draw inscribed circles.

    • Method Detail

      • computeVertex

        public java.awt.Point computeVertex(java.awt.Point centerPoint,
                                    double radius,
                                    double angle)
        Generates a vertex the given distance from the center point, and with the given angle offset.
        Parameters:
        centerPoint - center
        radius - baseRadius
        angle - The angle this vertex is offset from the vertex at the top of the triangle, given that the triangle is resting evenly on one side.
        Returns:
        The generated vertex.

      • generateColor

        public java.awt.Color generateColor(boolean isPrimary,
                                    int depth)
        Helper method for the recursive drawing function, produces a color based on the input parameters.
        Parameters:
        isPrimary - If true, generates the appropriate shade of the primary color, otherwise, this generates the appropriate shade of the secondary color.
        depth - The current recursion depth, used to produce the appropriate color.
        Returns:
        The generated color.

        public java.awt.Point getCenterPoint()
        Returns:
        the centerPoint

      • setCenterPoint

        public void setCenterPoint(java.awt.Point point)
        Parameters:
        point - the point to set

      • setColorSteps

        public void setColorSteps()
        Computes the change in color required to move evenly from black (0, 0, 0) to the given colors in drawingDepth steps.

      • setDepth

        public void setDepth(int depth)
        Sets the recursion depth and calls setColorSteps().
        Parameters:
        depth - The recursion depth to draw triangles to.

      • setDisplacementRate

        public void setDisplacementRate(int rate)
        Parameters:
        rate - the rate to set

      • setDrawCircle

        public void setDrawCircle(boolean drawCircle)
        Parameters:
        drawCircle - Whether or not inscribed circles should be drawn.

      • setFilled

        public void setFilled(boolean filled)
        Parameters:
        filled - Whether or not the triangles should be drawn as filled.

      • setPrimaryColor

        public void setPrimaryColor(java.awt.Color color)
        Parameters:
        color - the color to set

        public void setRadius(int radius)
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius to set

      • drawTriangle

        private void drawTriangle(java.awt.Graphics g,
                          java.awt.Point centerPoint,
                          int radius,
                          double rotationOffset,
                          java.awt.Color color,
                          boolean drawFilled)
        Draws a triangle, given the requisite information.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object to use for drawing.
        centerPoint - center
        radius - baseRadius
        rotationOffset - The angle offset at which to draw this triangle.
        color - The color with which to draw this triangle.
        drawFilled - filled

      • drawHelper

        private void drawHelper(java.awt.Graphics g,
                        int depth,
                        java.awt.Point centerPoint,
                        int radius,
                        double rotationOffset)
        Helper function for recursive drawing. This method does the work of recursively computing triangles and drawing them.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object to use for drawing.
        depth - drawingDepth
        centerPoint - center
        radius - baseRadius
        rotationOffset - The angle offset at which to draw this triangle.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws this Sierpinski triangle. A triangle with color BACKGROUND_COLOR should first be drawn before recursively drawing triangles on top of it. Be mindful of both the orientation of this initial triangle, and the orientation of the triangles drawn on top of it.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object to use for drawing.
